faqShippingAnswer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-7 business days. Express shipping is available for 1-2 business days. Shipping times may vary based on your location and product availability.
faqReturnAnswer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in original condition with tags attached. Digital products and personalized items are not eligible for returns.
faqPaymentQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
faqPaymentAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely.
faqAccountQuestion: How do I create an account?
faqAccountAnswer: Click the 'Sign Up' button on the login page, enter your email and create a password. You can also sign up using your Google or Facebook account for faster registration.
faqOrderQuestion: How can I track my order?
faqOrderAnswer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also check your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your account.
faqRefundAnswer: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after we receive your return. The refund will be credited to your original payment method.
faqSellerQuestion: How do I become a seller?
faqSellerAnswer: To become a seller, go to your profile and click 'Become a Seller'. You'll need to provide business information, tax details, and verify your identity.
faqSafetyAnswer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and payment information. We never share your data with third parties without your consent.

modalSection3Description: Protecting your privacy is our top priority. Please be assured that your information will be kept secured and uncompromised.
